custom-item-despawn-duration.config.comm: Any changes made here will not affect already dropped items.
custom-item-despawn-duration.config.modi: Whether or not the mod should set an item's despawn duration to the default item duration config when it isn't in the item despawn duration map.
custom-item-despawn-duration.config.defa: The time in seconds to set the despawn duration of an item if the toggle above is activated.
custom-item-despawn-duration.config.desp: You can specify the despawn duration of items in the map editor.
custom-item-despawn-duration.config.lanW: Changes done here are effective immediately, because your world is opened to LAN.
custom-item-despawn-duration.config.item: This item is not present in the game. The mod adding this item might've been removed.
This item has already been added to the map.
